channel.title: What the root password using for?
channel.description: The root password of Whonix Gateway is not asked when I use apt-get, and root is not allowed to login on the KDE login screen. What the root password using for?

item.title: What the root password using for?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
root login into graphical desktop environment discouraged and unsupported.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#GUI_Applications_with_Root_Rights

Read full topic
item.source: What the root password using for?
